alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:09PM EDT until April 05 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR WESTERN BEDFORD...SOUTHWESTERN BLAIR...SOUTH CENTRAL CAMBRIA AND EASTERN SOMERSET COUNTIES... At 1009 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Portage to Central City to near Meyersdale, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Windber, Bedford, Belmont, Portage, Geistown, Meyersdale, Berlin, Claysburg, Friedens, Vinco and Osterburg. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 114 to 151. Interstate 99 from mile markers 0 to 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
